name: Fun Fly 1: Ryzen of Bad Kitten
name_original: Fun Fly 1: Ryzen of Bad Kitten
description:
Ten things you'd love about FUN FLY 1:
01** Totally different gameplay for each spaceship.
02** 17 and more bosses to encounter then defeat. Each of them has its own characteristic, strength and weakness!!!
03** Simple to play, years to master the true power of the galaxy...
04** No hidden cost, no endless upgrading... its only about your skill and your chosen ship tonight. You are in responsible for the fate of the planet.
05** Pixel artistic style at its masterpiece.
06** Those kittens are real badasses!!!
07** The game is continuously updated.
08** There are ester eggs to discover everywhere. Be curious.
09** It's a Cakeogame product. We only make good games.
10** It's free fun, GRAB your DOWNLOAD now and fight

Sound, FX and Music credit to:
- Metaruka
- wobbleboxx.com
- Alexander Ehlers
